price: Sọ fún àwọn ẹrúsìn Mi pé kí wọ́n máa sọ èyí tó dára jùlọ (nínú ọ̀rọ̀). Dájúdájú Èṣù yóò máa dá yánpọn-yánrin sílẹ̀ láààrin wọn. Dájúdájú Èṣù jẹ́ ọ̀tá pọ́nńbélé fún ènìyàn.
arabic: وَقُل لِّعِبَادِي يَقُولُواْ ٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُۚ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ يَنزَغُ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ كَانَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ عَدُوّٗا مُّبِينٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqul liʿibādī yaqūlū allatī hiya aḥsanu inna al-shayṭāna yanzaghu baynahum inna al-shayṭāna kāna lil'insāni ʿaduwwan mubīnan
